synopsis.text: The eternally dark vampire city of Salta is home to Hipira, an adventurous young vampire boy. Like any curious child, Hipira gets into mischief with his vampire schoolmates and neighbors. However, his playful pranks sometimes land him in tricky situations. On his exploits across the monster-filled city, Hipira befriends souls, pulls daylight pranks, and even encounters aliens! But with his lively spirit and loyal friends by his side, he always manages to find his way out of trouble. Join Hipira as he navigates the whimsical worlds hidden within the darkness of Salta.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
